name: Compile Master Server

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'Master Server/**'
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:
    paths:
      - 'Master Server/**'
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    - name: Set up JDK 21
      uses: actions/setup-java@v4
      with:
        java-version: '21'
        distribution: 'temurin'
    - name: Build with Ant
      run: ant -noinput -buildfile 'Master Server/build.xml'
